name: Dr. Green Feather
description:
This Game was made for the GDL June Gene Jam, It is definitely not finished . But it is playable!

  1. A is to Adjust you Seed's DNA.
  2. S is to Throw out a Seed, Tap to just place one, Hold to Charge and Throw.
  3. Arrow Keys to move and Jump.
  4. Esc = Exit, Delete = Restart Game, Enter = Restart Level.

There are only 2 levels, reach the arch way to move onto the next level.
